Summary: wobbling disk in clear blue sky
divs: Sighting Detailson dec 12,about 1:00 in the afternoon,i was walking into a department store when something shinny caught my eye....i glanced at it at first and then i took a double take....it was a shinny disc wobbling...almost like it was in trouble......it was a clear blue sky out....not a cloud to be seen....this disc that was wobbling was appearing and then dissapearing in the blue sky....when it would re-appear ,a white cloud was around it, ,the cloud or steam quickly disappered revieling the disk.....then it seemed like it just turned blue like the sky.....did not move side to side just up and down....hard to explain.......this went on for about 3 minutes....i was looking around for someone to share this with but no one was there ...my first ufo sighting...it was shinny silver with darker lines from side to side.....it was wobbling pretty good...if anyone was in it ,they were throwing their guts up...thanks for listening...mike
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around December 12th 2009
